entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Fort Albany
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:57 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
